title: Pan-Seared Salmon
steps: Pat salmon very dry. Season flesh side with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in nonstick skillet over medium-high until shimmering.
Place salmon skin-side down. Press firmly 10 seconds.
Cook without moving until skin is crispy and salmon is cooked ⅔ up, 5-6 minutes.
Flip. Add butter and garlic. Cook 1-2 minutes, basting.
Remove. Drizzle with lemon juice and herbs.
Serve skin-side up to keep skin crispy.
